name: Mr. Rajesh Kathirvel
about:
Hi! I'm Rajesh Kathirvel, a passionate 3rd-year B.Tech student in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science at Al-Ameen Engineering College, Erode.

I have a strong interest in machine learning, deep learning, and data analytics. My goal is to leverage AI technologies to solve real-world problems efficiently. I enjoy working on projects related to data science, predictive modeling, and AI-driven applications.

projects.title: Startup Company Prediction
projects.description: A machine learning model to predict startup success.

projects.title: Text Sentimental Analysis
projects.description: A sentiment analysis tool to Predict Text's sentiment.

projects.title: Voice-Text Sentimental Analysis
projects.description: A sentiment analysis tool to Predict Voice and Text's sentiment.

projects.title: Fake_News_Detection_with_Streamlit
projects.description: NLP Tool for Detecting Fake News
